Name: Relentless
About the game: You're starting tomorrow your first day as head trading in a young hedge fund. You will have to trade shares of different activity sector to get the best rentability and earn as much money as possible! Use every information available, exercice your trader instincts and become the biggest fish in the financial ocean! Be ready! Take part in executive board of the biggest companies to affect their decisions: pay dividend, finance studies, build factories, put pressure on the governement... Discover a financial environement held by increasingly restrictive financial laws, learn to comply with them... or to avoid them... Use the money you earn to get out of your low-class life. Buy home, put your money in safety, get rich and show it! But be carefull, your actions have an impact on real economy, be ready to suffer the consequences of your action. We are all the same in the eyes of the relentless market finance...
Meta Title: Relentless: Mar 13, 2020, Breakpoint Games and Full Overview
Meta Description: Looking for information on Relentless? Check out the release date (Mar 13, 2020), developer insights from Breakpoint Games, and a complete game summary.
